Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Hoop AllSmallHoop is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic Hoop of orders 2 to 9.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallHoop">
The output hoop are represented by its operation table for +, *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small Hoop
"IsASmallHoop" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic Hoop of orders 2 to 9. It returns true if the model is a Small Hoop, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallHoop">
